title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Disable the tips when hovering over instruments
description:
In this video we will look at how you can switch off the information shown in the cockpit when hovering over the buttons. As you might have experience yourself after Sim Update V these pop ups have started to appear even though you disabled them in the assistance menu.
